title: What Font Is This - Please Help!
content:
I'm looking to identiy this font to "revamp" my ultrasound images which are badly damaged.

Thankyou

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontd_6535.PNG)
author: Michelle1516

comments.content:
This should be in our font ID area:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130618/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

That said you can look at these:

May be close but you are trying to match a screen font

Teen Bold from Hypodermic

Pluto Condensed Bold  
from HVD Fonts

Vitro ExtraBold  
from The Northern Block Ltd
